Articles.Content: How do I install the B5 Block 5 textures?

9 hours ago, alberro+ said:

How do I install the B5 Block 5 textures?

Download the B5 textures and put them into your game data folder. Then when you load up ksp and you right click a spacex part you can change the texture

6 hours ago, spacefreak said:

Download the B5 textures and put them into your game data folder. Then when you load up ksp and you right click a spacex part you can change the texture

Did that, put the B5 textures are just grey. Any fix?

Sorry for spamming this post.

When I download the SpaceX pack, It shows up as Launchers Pack, and so does the Delta Pack. Is there a way I can change the name without breaking the mod?

6 hours ago, alberro+ said:

When I download the SpaceX pack, It shows up as Launchers Pack, and so does the Delta Pack. Is there a way I can change the name without breaking the mod?

You shouldn't need to for the mod to work.

15 hours ago, alberro+ said:

Sorry for spamming this post.

When I download the SpaceX pack, It shows up as Launchers Pack, and so does the Delta Pack. Is there a way I can change the name without breaking the mod?

Nope, you'd break the mod. Why would you want to do that?

1 hour ago, Kartoffelkuchen said:

Nope, you'd break the mod. Why would you want to do that?

Since both mods are listed as  Launchers Pack , I am required to replace one of the two. Is there a way I can put both of them?

@alberro+ you should be able to just install one, then install the second, and select "Merge folders", and select overwrite for any existing files...

If, after doing that, post back, cuz after that, if there are conflicts, issues, missing files or errors thrown, then yes, KK may have to look at re-arranging the folder structure to a moar "standard" KSP structure.

I *do* notice the folder structure for both mods is slightly unorthodox, and I can see how manually installing both could be confusing. vOv

Does anyone who flys the delta iv heavy with RO burn up on ascent. I have turned down thrust and every but mechjeb with ascent guidance just flys the rocket and it burns up during ascent.

4 hours ago, Prathtel said:

Does anyone who flys the delta iv heavy with RO burn up on ascent. I have turned down thrust and every but mechjeb with ascent guidance just flys the rocket and it burns up during ascent.

mechjeb has an issue with that rocket, pvg can't seem to properly handle it. Fly it manually or use KOS.

I have an issue where everytime I try to launch the Atlas V 551, it tips over. Mechjeb can't fly it, and the weirdest part is that I used to launch it without any issues. Is there any good ways to launch it?

Also, are there any plans on updating this mod (Atlas pack)?

16 hours ago, SpeedShot7 said:

I have an issue where everytime I try to launch the Atlas V 551, it tips over. Mechjeb can't fly it, and the weirdest part is that I used to launch it without any issues. Is there any good ways to launch it?

Also, are there any plans on updating this mod (Atlas pack)? 

Sorry, I'm a little out of the loop currently with my mods. I think that tipping over has to do with inaccurate drag cubes being generated, I guess it also happens with the other Atlas 5xx rockets? I'm not sure if I want to update the Atlas rockets, they are really old and, in my opinion, quality is not that great.

So an update for the Atlas pack probably won't happen anytime soon, though maybe I decide one day to pick it up and polish these rockets again, but no promises.
